text: Marvel Studios Special Presentations are a series of television specials based on Marvel Comics characters. Set in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU) and produced by Marvel Studios, the specials are released on Disney+. The first special, Werewolf by Night, was released on October 7, 2022. This is one of the few MCU projects to not mention any of the MCU's movies or series. The second special, The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special, was released on November 25, 2022. Both specials are part of Phase Four of the MCU. == Specials == === Phase Four === Special Release date Director Writer(s) Werewolf by Night Michael Giacchino Heather Quinn and Peter Cameron The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special James Gunn == Reception == Special Rotten Tomatoes Metacritic Werewolf by Night 89% (114 reviews) 69 (17 reviews) The Guardians of the Galaxy Holiday Special 94% (62 reviews) 82 (8 reviews) == References == Category:Disney+ original television series
title: Marvel Studios Special Presentations
